= Release 1.2 =

== New ==
Added [http://jmortgage.googlecode.com/svn/tags/release-1.2/site/apidocs/jmortgage/pmi/package-summary.html pmi] package.

Added [http://jmortgage.googlecode.com/svn/tags/release-1.2/site/apidocs/jmortgage/pmi/PMICalculator.html PMICalculator] interface.

Added [http://jmortgage.googlecode.com/svn/tags/release-1.2/site/apidocs/jmortgage/pmi/DefaultPMICalculator.html DefaultPMICalculator] class.

Added methods to create PMICalculator implementations and DefaultPMICalculator instantiations in [http://jmortgage.googlecode.com/svn/tags/release-1.2/site/apidocs/jmortgage/JMortgageFactory.html JMortgageFactory].

== Changes ==
Switched from ant build to maven2 build.
